showScoreExcerpt: "Amazing bursts of magic that dazzle in the darkness, distinctive characterizations of a host of eccentric, endearing, and evil personalities by an enthralling cast...Under Tiffany's masterful direction, the depth and richness of the characters' emotions and psychology are never lost amidst the captivating spectacle. There is a fine balance between surreal fantasy and universal feelings...unsurpassed production values...truly superlative work."
